Dispute_Type: Civil dispute over patent rights and procedural fairness in discovery
Legal_Issue: Whether the defendant's action can be stayed until resolution of a related case involving Cummings Point
Governing_Law: Section 50 of the Federal Court Act
Evidence_Assessment: Defendant sold the accused division prior to providing access to records or personnel; plaintiff retains right to examine defendant despite limited information access
Burden_of_Proof: On the defendant to demonstrate lack of access to necessary information to justify non-participation in discovery
Legal_Rule: A stay may be granted under s. 50 of the Federal Court Act only if continuing the action causes prejudice or injustice to the defendant and does not harm the plaintiff
Standard_of_Review: Judicial discretion based on balance of prejudice and fairness
Procedural_Issue: Request for stay of proceedings to avoid duplicate litigation
Grounds_for_Claim: Defendant sought to avoid duplicative proceedings by staying its case pending outcome of related litigation
Outcome_on_Merits: Stay denied; defendant must proceed with discovery
Review_Standard: Prejudice or injustice to the defendant without harming the plaintiff
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Continuing discovery is fair as plaintiff has legitimate right to examination; defendant may request extension due to logistical challenges
Key_Evidence_Considered: Timing of sale of accused division, availability of records and personnel for discovery
Legal_Framework: Federal Court Act, specifically s. 50 governing stays
Applicant_Challenge: Defendant applied for a stay of proceedings
Court_Result: Defendant required to participate in discovery with extended time to arrange compliance
Defendant_Response: Sought stay due to sale of business unit and claimed difficulty in accessing information
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence, procedural history, assertions regarding access to corporate records and personnel
Remedy_Sought: Avoidance of duplicate proceedings through procedural delay
Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial determination on interim procedural motion
Claimant_Status: Plaintiff in active patent infringement litigation
Applicable_Process: Interlocutory application for stay of proceedings
